hero.title: NeuroMita
hero.subtitle: Chat with Mitas through neural networks

features.title: Features

items.title: Advanced AI
items.description: Gemini, DeepSeek, Grok and other top models for realistic communication with characters.

items.title: Voice Dubbing
items.description: Telegram bots or local voice synthesis - choose a convenient way to bring dialogues to life.

items.title: Flexible Setup
items.description: Free and paid APIs, prompt customization, model selection - everything is under your control.

items.title: Easy Installation
items.description: MelonLoader, a couple of files, and you're ready. Press Tab to type, Enter to send.

items.title: Diverse Characters
items.description: Kind Mita, Short-Haired, Cap, Mila - each has her own character and communication style.

items.title: Open Source
items.description: Python + C# code is open. Join the development and improve the mod with us.

features.warning:
Developers wanted!
C# Unity programmers and animator assistants - contact on Discord: vinerx

footer.docsLink: Documentation and source code on GitHub
